TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateContent extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现录制和播放逻辑，模板在与 XAML 读取器和编写器交互时将使用该逻辑推迟内容。

span.span: Implements the record and playback logic that templates use for deferring content when they interact with XAML readers and writers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类在.NET Framework 4.5 测试版中的公共 API。This class has no public API in .NET Framework 4.5 Beta. 它提供的属性值。It provides a property value for . 其构造函数是内部。Its constructor is internal. 实例化途径的不同，但却比较复杂。There is an instantiation pathway, but it is complex. 实例化模板依赖于，这要求表示延迟的读取器实例和一个服务。Instantiating a template relies on , which requires a representing a deferred reader instance, and a service. 这两个这些注意事项是通常仅与那些不使用的是默认 XAML 的 WPF 处理行为，包括推迟的内容处理的模板作为它的基础结构的一部分，并且不需要的典型的 WPF 应用程序若要访问前面提到的 Api 的作者。Both these considerations are typically only relevant to those that are not using the default XAML for WPF processing behavior, which includes deferred content processing of templates as part of its infrastructure, and does not require the typical WPF application author to access the aforementioned APIs.
